mapper.select: select password from sys_user_info where id = #{_parameter}

SELECT a.id, a.pid, a.`name` AS title, a.icon, a.href, a.type, a.target FROM sys_permission_info a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.`status` = 0 AND a.type < 3 AND EXISTS ( SELECT rp.permission_id FROM sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_role_info ri ON ( rp.role_id = ri.id ) WHERE ri.del_flag = 0 AND ri.`status` = 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT ur.role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} AND rp.role_id = ur.role_id ) AND a.id = rp.permission_id ) ORDER BY a.type, a.pid, a.sort
